participant_1.background:
I'll be running around town to get inspiration for my next mural.
i do not eat well.
i like pasta.
i like getting packages in the mail.

participant_2.background:
My pets are a source of great joy and companionship, and they help me to stay connected to the natural world.
i have perfect pitch.
I do my best to keep up with my family, although it's hard to stay connected with everyone when you're working all the time.
I am short for my age, but I am strong and fit.
I am grateful that my job provides me with the flexibility to be there for my son when he needs me.

content.text: Hi there! I'm an artist, and I'm working on a new mural. I'm looking for some inspiration, so I'm going to be running around town. What do you do for fun?
Hi! I'm a stay-at-home mom to my 10-year-old son. I love spending time with him, and we have a lot of fun together. I also have a few pets, and they're a huge source of joy for me.
That sounds really nice! I love spending time with my pets too. What kinds of pets do you have?

I have a dog, a cat, and a fish. My dog is a golden retriever named Buddy, and he's the sweetest dog ever. My cat is a tabby named Mittens, and she's always getting into trouble. My fish is a betta fish named Nemo, and he's really beautiful.
Those all sound like great pets! I love golden retrievers. They're such gentle dogs.
They are! Buddy is the perfect dog for my family. He's always happy to see us, and he loves to play.
That sounds great! I'm glad you have such a great dog.
Thanks! I'm really lucky to have him.
I'm sure your son is also lucky to have him!
He is! Buddy is his best friend.
That's so sweet! I'm glad you guys have each other
